page.title: 06LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
We undertook a survey of families in one class asking about the use of {leisure facilities.}
Two thirds of those who answered went swimming every week. Others went to weight training, roller skating, keep fit, badminton and gymnastics. The first two of these being the most popular.Most people were satisfied with the facilities and prices. {Public Houses.} Witham has 16 public houses.Most of them are in Newland Street reflecting Witham's importance as a coaching town in the 18th and 19th centuries. In the sample, 50% of the families used a pub in Witham sometimes, a majoritory thought that there were too many pubs, and the same number said that they would use them more if there was a children's room for them to use.
